script.name: plugin.gz.CmpClean.crunch
script.description: CompClean - Assimilate factories into factory modules
script.sourceplaintext:
$CClean.Config = get global variable: name='GZ.CCLEAN.CONFIG' $PageID = $CClean.Config[2] $Debug = $CClean.Config[1] $XTC.enabled = get global variable: name='XTC.ENABLED' * $Debug = [TRUE]
$New.Z = $Position[2] $New.Y = $Position[1] $New.Y.create = $New.Y + 800000 $New.X = $Position[0] $Sector = $Position[3] * goto label Cleanup:
do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[FALSE] printf: fmt='%s: CmpClean - CRUNCH started in sector %s', [THIS], $Sector, null, null, null
$Stationdummy.Type = $CClean.Config[4] $Stationdummy.Size = $CClean.Config[5] $Modular.Factories = $CClean.Config[6]
$Mine.Fraction.Ore = 0 $Mine.Fraction.Silicon = 0 $Mine.Fraction.Ice = 0 $Factories.created = 0 $Factories.deleted = 0 $Cash.Store = 0 $Cash.Add = 0
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - * Filter stations. Complexed stations can not be used. $Station.Arr = $Sector -> get player owned station array from sector $Index1 = size of array $Station.Arr while $Index1 > 0 dec $Index1 = $Station = $Station.Arr[$Index1]
if $Station -> get local variable: name='GZ.FACTORY.MODULE' $Station ->ignore collisions: [TRUE] $New.X = $Station -> get x position $New.Y = $Station -> get y position $New.Z = $Station -> get z position $New.Y.create = $New.Y + 800000 end if $Station -> get local variable: name='GZ.WAREHOUSE' do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Filtered OUT : %s : %s', $Station, 'Is a warehouse', null, null, null remove element from array $Station.Arr at index $Index1 continue end
* only REAL factories return 1+ $Dummy1 = $Station -> get number of products per cycle if not $Dummy1 do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Filtered OUT : %s : %s', $Station, 'No producing factory', null, null, null remove element from array $Station.Arr at index $Index1 continue end if $Station -> get local variable: name='GZ.CCLEAN.IGNORE' do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Filtered OUT : %s : %s', $Station, 'GZ.CCLEAN.IGNORE set', null, null, null remove element from array $Station.Arr at index $Index1 continue end if not $Station -> get max. store amount of ware Energy Cells do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Filtered OUT : %s : %s', $Station, 'carries no EC', null, null, null remove element from array $Station.Arr at index $Index1 continue end if not [PLAYERSHIP] -> is docking allowed at $Station do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Filtered OUT : %s : %s', $Station, 'docking not allowed: complexed station', null, null, null remove element from array $Station.Arr at index $Index1 continue end
$Dummy1 = $Station -> get ware type code of object if not find $Dummy1 in array: $Stationdummy.Type if $Station -> uses ware Ore as product skip if $Station -> get local variable: name='GZ.FACTORY.MODULE' $Station ->set local variable: name='GZ.CC.REAL.MINE' value=[TRUE]
else if $Station -> uses ware Silicon Wafers as product skip if $Station -> get local variable: name='GZ.FACTORY.MODULE' $Station ->set local variable: name='GZ.CC.REAL.MINE' value=[TRUE] else if $Station -> uses ware Ice as product skip if $Station -> get local variable: name='GZ.FACTORY.MODULE' $Station ->set local variable: name='GZ.CC.REAL.MINE' value=[TRUE] end end
if $Station -> uses ware Nividium as product do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Filtered OUT : %s : %s', $Station, 'produces Nividium', null, null, null remove element from array $Station.Arr at index $Index1 continue end
* Check for multiple (or no) product factories, * which do not really work in complexes $Dummy2 = 0 $Ware.Arr = $Station -> get tradable ware array from station $Index2 = size of array $Ware.Arr while $Index2 dec $Index2 = $Dummy1 = $Ware.Arr[$Index2] do if $Station -> uses ware $Dummy1 as product inc $Dummy2 = end if $Dummy2 != 1 remove element from array $Station.Arr at index $Index1 continue end
* XTC stations must have run their setup for player build stations first. if $XTC.enabled if not $Station -> get local variable: name='XTC.LOCAL.STATION.CONFIGURED' remove element from array $Station.Arr at index $Index1 continue end end
* Station too big to crunch: Only max size MODULES are ignored * Super sized mines are not a problem. if $Station -> get local variable: name='GZ.FACTORY.MODULE' $Index2 = size of array $Stationdummy.Size dec $Index2 = $Dummy2 = $Stationdummy.Type[$Index2] $Dummy1 = $Station -> get ware type code of object * = max size factory module I have * gosub Find.station.size: if $Dummy1 == $Dummy2 do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Filtered OUT : %s : %s', $Station, 'This is a MAX size factory module.', null, null, null remove element from array $Station.Arr at index $Index1 continue end end end
$Index1 = size of array $Station.Arr skip if $Index1 goto label Exit.no.stations
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - * Sort stations by type - all sizes * Sort by KIND of resources, regardless of size * stations.sorted = full storage array, stations.match= only first entry for match $Stations.Sorted = array alloc: size=0 $Stations.Match = array alloc: size=0
$Index1 = size of array $Station.Arr do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='- - Start sorting %s stations: %s', $Index1, $Station.Arr, null, null, null
while $Index1 > 0 dec $Index1 = $Station = $Station.Arr[$Index1] gosub Find.matching.station.type do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Match: %s, Matchindex: %s', $Match, $Index2, null, null, null if not $Match * New station type found do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt=' New entry for : %s', $Station, null, null, null, null append $Station to array $Stations.Match $Dummy1 = array alloc: size=0 append $Station to array $Dummy1 append $Dummy1 to array $Stations.Sorted else * Add to existing entry do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt=' Adding %s to existing subarray at index %s', $Station, $Index2, null, null, null $Dummy1 = $Stations.Sorted[$Index2] append $Station to array $Dummy1 end end
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - * Combine Factories into bigger ones $Mine.Fraction.Ore = 0 $Mine.Fraction.Silicon = 0 $Index1 = size of array $Stations.Sorted $Index2 = size of array $Stations.Match do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Crunch: Got sorted array of %s, match array of %s. %s, %s', $Index1, $Index2, null, null, null while $Index1 > 0 dec $Index1 = $Stations.Subarray = $Stations.Sorted[$Index1]
* Find combined production factor of all similiar fabs
$Station = $Stations.Subarray[0] $Ware.Arr = $Station -> get tradable ware array from station $Dummy1 = size of array $Ware.Arr $Ware.Stock = array alloc: size=$Dummy1
$New.regular.fab.detected = [FALSE] $Station.size.total = 0 $Index2 = size of array $Stations.Subarray while $Index2 > 0 dec $Index2 = $Station = $Stations.Subarray[$Index2] skip if $Station -> get local variable: name='GZ.FACTORY.MODULE' $New.regular.fab.detected = [TRUE]
gosub Find.station.size $Station.size.total = $Station.size.total + $Factory.size
* Assemble stock levels while I'm looping the subarray anyway $Index3 = size of array $Ware.Arr while $Index3 > 0 dec $Index3 = $Dummy1 = $Ware.Arr[$Index3] $Dummy1 = $Station -> get amount of ware $Dummy1 in cargo bay $Dummy2 = $Ware.Stock[$Index3] if $Dummy2 == null $Ware.Stock[$Index3] = $Dummy1 else $Dummy1 = $Dummy2 + $Dummy1 $Ware.Stock[$Index3] = $Dummy1 end end
end * end Index 2
if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Stations of type %s have a combined prod factor of %s', $Station, $Station.size.total, null, null, null write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Combined stock levels: %s, %s', $Ware.Arr, $Ware.Stock, null, null, null end
* Find minimum number of factories $Nr.of.Factories = 0 $Station.size.temp = $Station.size.total $Index3 = size of array $Stationdummy.Size while $Index3 > 0 dec $Index3 = $Dummy1 = $Stationdummy.Size[$Index3] while $Station.size.temp >= $Dummy1 $Station.size.temp = $Station.size.temp - $Dummy1 inc $Nr.of.Factories = do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt=' - - substract: %s', $Dummy1, null, null, null, null end end
$Index3 = size of array $Stations.Subarray do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt=' + + + + Current Nr of %s stations: %s, Projected Nr: %s', $Station, $Index3, $Nr.of.Factories, null, null
do if $Index3 <= $Nr.of.Factories AND $New.regular.fab.detected == [FALSE] continue * I CAN reduce the Nr of factories: * Annihilate all stations in the subarray and recreate from scratch.
$Station.size.temp = $Station.size.total $Index3 = size of array $Stationdummy.Size $Station = $Stations.Subarray[0] while $Index3 > 0 dec $Index3 = $Dummy1 = $Stationdummy.Size[$Index3] while $Station.size.temp >= $Dummy1 * Create Factory $Station.size.temp = $Station.size.temp - $Dummy1 $Dummy2 = $Stationdummy.Type[$Index3] inc $Factories.created =
$Station.New = create station: type=$Dummy2 owner=Player addto=$Sector x=$New.X y=$New.Y.create z=$New.Z $Station.New ->set local variable: name='GZ.TOW.PROTECT' value=[TRUE] $Station.New ->set local variable: name='GZ.FACTORY.MODULE' value=[TRUE] $Station.New ->force position: x=$New.X y=$New.Y z=$New.Z $Station.New ->ignore collisions: [TRUE] $Dummy4 = ( $Index3 + 2 ) * 3 = $Station.New -> install $Dummy4 units of 2 GJ Shield $Dummy4 = $Station.New -> get maximum shield strength $Dummy4 = $Dummy4 / 1000000 do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Created station: %s with %s GJ of shields.', $Station.New, $Dummy4, null, null, null
* Adjust Wares $Index4 = size of array $Ware.Arr while $Index4 > 0 dec $Index4 = $Ware.Type = $Ware.Arr[$Index4] $Dummy3 = $Ware.Stock[$Index4] if $Dummy3 == null continue end if $Station -> uses ware $Ware.Type as primary resource $Station.New ->add primary resource to factory: $Ware.Type end if $Station -> uses ware $Ware.Type as secondary resource $Station.New ->add second resource to factory: $Ware.Type end if $Station -> uses ware $Ware.Type as product $Station.New ->add product to factory or dock: $Ware.Type $Msg = sprintf: fmt='FACT %s (%s)', $Ware.Type, $Dummy1, null, null, null $Station.New ->set name to $Msg end $Dummy4 = $Station.New -> get max. store amount of ware $Ware.Type if $Dummy4 <= $Dummy3 = $Station.New -> add $Dummy4 units of $Ware.Type $Dummy3 = $Dummy3 - $Dummy4 $Ware.Stock[$Index4] = $Dummy3 else = $Station.New -> add $Dummy3 units of $Ware.Type $Ware.Stock[$Index4] = 0 end end * end Index4 $Station.New ->station trade and production tasks: on=[TRUE] end end * end Index3
* All factories I want are now created. * Destroy old ones $Index2 = size of array $Stations.Subarray while $Index2 > 0 dec $Index2 = $Station = $Stations.Subarray[$Index2] gosub Undock.all.ships $Cash.Add = $Station -> get money gosub Store.Cash * $Dummy2 = get player money * skip if $Dummy1 > 1000000000 OR $Dummy2 > 1000000000 * add money to player: $Dummy1 inc $Factories.deleted = $Station ->destruct: show no explosion=[TRUE] end if $Station.New -> exists $Cash.Add = $Station.New -> get money gosub Store.Cash $Cash.Add = -1 * $Cash.Add $Station.New ->add money: $Cash.Add $Station.New ->add money: $Cash.Store $Cash.Store = 0 end end * end Index1 * Done with all subarrays. Finito! goto label Exit.job.done
return null
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Find.station.size: * Return the production factor of STATION as FACTORY.SIZE * Do resource test on a DISABLED fab because turning on production * ALTERS the stock levels.
if $Station -> get local variable: name='GZ.FACTORY.MODULE' gosub Find.Station.Size.regular endsub end $Dummy1 = get index of $Station in array $Stationdummy.Type offset=-1 + 1 if not $Dummy1 == -1 $Factory.size = $Stationdummy.Size[$Dummy1] endsub end
* It's a NEW factory or mine. * $Station-> set local variable: name='GZ.CC.REAL.MINE' value=[TRUE]
if $Station -> uses ware Ore as product gosub Find.Station.Size.Mine else if $Station -> uses ware Silicon Wafers as product gosub Find.Station.Size.Mine else if $Station -> uses ware Ice as product gosub Find.Station.Size.Mine else gosub Find.Station.Size.regular end endsub
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Find.Station.Size.Mine: $Dummy1 = $Station -> get number of products per cycle $Dummy2 = $Station -> get production cycle time: account for secondary resources=null * = cycle time in sec, even if out of resources
if $Station -> uses ware Silicon Wafers as product $Factory.size = ( $Dummy1 * 10000 ) / $Dummy2 + $Mine.Fraction.Silicon $Dummy1 = ( $Factory.size / 173 ) * 173 $Mine.Fraction.Silicon = $Factory.size - $Dummy1 $Factory.size = $Factory.size / 173
* Ore and Ice use the same formula else if $Station -> uses ware Ore as product $Factory.size = ( $Dummy1 * 10000 ) / $Dummy2 + $Mine.Fraction.Ore $Dummy1 = ( $Factory.size / 694 ) * 694 $Mine.Fraction.Ore = $Factory.size - $Dummy1 $Factory.size = $Factory.size / 694
else if $Station -> uses ware Ice as product $Factory.size = ( $Dummy1 * 10000 ) / $Dummy2 + $Mine.Fraction.Ice $Dummy1 = ( $Factory.size / 694 ) * 694 $Mine.Fraction.Ice = $Factory.size - $Dummy1 $Factory.size = $Factory.size / 694
end endsub
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Find.Station.Size.regular: $Station.Test = $Station -> get ware type code of object $Station.Test = create station: type=$Station.Test owner=Neutral Race addto=null x=0 y=0 z=0 $Station.Test ->add primary resource to factory: Energy Cells $Factory.size = $Station.Test -> get max. store amount of ware Energy Cells $Station.Test ->destruct: show no explosion=[TRUE] $Factory.size = $Factory.size / 5000 endsub
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Find.matching.station.type:
$Match = null $Index2 = size of array $Stations.Match while $Index2 > 0 AND $Match == null dec $Index2 = $Station2 = $Stations.Match[$Index2]
do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Matching: %s + %s', $Station, $Station2, null, null, null $Match = [TRUE] $Ware.Arr = $Station -> get tradable ware array from station $Dummy3 = $Station2 -> get tradable ware array from station $Dummy2 = size of array $Dummy3 $Index3 = size of array $Ware.Arr if $Index3 != $Dummy2 do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt=' FAIL: Ware arrays are %s + %s, %s + %s', $Index3, $Dummy2, $Ware.Arr, $Dummy3, null $Match = null end while $Index3 > 0 dec $Index3 = $Dummy1 = $Ware.Arr[$Index3] if $Station -> uses ware $Dummy1 as primary resource if not $Station2 -> uses ware $Dummy1 as primary resource $Match = null end end if $Station -> uses ware $Dummy1 as secondary resource if not $Station2 -> uses ware $Dummy1 as secondary resource $Match = null end end if $Station -> uses ware $Dummy1 as product if not $Station2 -> uses ware $Dummy1 as product $Match = null end end
end end endsub
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Undock.all.ships: $Dummy1 = $Station -> get ship array from sector/ship/station $Index4 = size of array $Dummy1 while $Index4 > 0 dec $Index4 = $Dummy2 = $Dummy1[$Index4] $Dummy2 ->put into environment $Sector -> $Dummy2 ->set position: x=$New.X y=$New.Y z=$New.Z end endsub
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Exit.no.stations: $Dummy1 = sprintf: pageid=$PageID textid=205, $Sector, null, null, null, null @ = wait 1 ms send incoming message $Dummy1 to player: display it=[TRUE] = speak text: page=13 id=1246 priority=5 return null
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Exit.job.done: gosub Cleanup $Dummy2 = $Factories.deleted - $Factories.created $Msg = sprintf: pageid=$PageID textid=206, $Sector, $Dummy2, null, null, null @ = wait 1 ms send incoming message $Msg to player: display it=[TRUE]
skip if $Dummy2 = speak text: page=13 id=1246 priority=5 return null
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - * - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Cleanup: if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt=' ', null, null, null, null, null write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Cleanup starting', null, null, null, null, null end $Module.Holder = null
* $Station.Arr = $Sector-> get player owned station array from sector $Station.Arr = $Sector -> get station array from sector $Index1 = size of array $Station.Arr $Station.size.total = 0 while $Index1 > 0 dec $Index1 = $Station = $Station.Arr[$Index1] if $Station -> get local variable: name='GZ.FACTORY.MODULE' $Dummy1 = $Station -> get ware type code of object $Dummy1 = get index of $Dummy1 in array $Stationdummy.Type offset=-1 + 1 $Factory.size = $Stationdummy.Size[$Dummy1] $Station.size.total = $Station.size.total + $Factory.size do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Detected size %s module: %s', $Dummy1, $Station, null, null, null
else if $Station -> get local variable: name='GZ.FACTORY.MODULE.HOLDER' $Module.Holder ->remove product from factory or dock: Lasertower $Module.Holder ->remove product from factory or dock: SQUASH Mine do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Detected module holder: %s', $Station, $Station, null, null, null do if $Module.Holder -> exists $Module.Holder ->destruct: show no explosion=[TRUE] $Module.Holder = $Station $Dummy1 = $Module.Holder -> get owner race do if $Dummy1 == Player $Module.Holder ->set owner race to Neutral Race end end do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='There are modules worth %s units total in sector %s.', $Station.size.total, $Sector, null, null, null
* Realign all modules to an existing module holder if $Module.Holder -> exists $New.X = $Module.Holder -> get x position $New.Y = $Module.Holder -> get y position $New.Z = $Module.Holder -> get z position $Index1 = size of array $Station.Arr while $Index1 > 0 dec $Index1 = $Station = $Station.Arr[$Index1] if $Station -> get local variable: name='GZ.FACTORY.MODULE' do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Update station position of %s to %s, %s, %s', $Station, $New.X, $New.Y, $New.Z, null $Station ->set position: x=$New.X y=$New.Y z=$New.Z $Station ->force position: x=$New.X y=$New.Y z=$New.Z end end end
$Dummy1 = $Station.size.total $Index1 = -1 while $Index1 < 7 * Index1 = Module Holder type index 0 - 7 inc $Index1 = $Dummy2 = 75 + $Index1 * $Index1 * 7 $Dummy1 = $Dummy1 - $Dummy2 do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='MH Size? Block %s holds %s fab units. Remaining to allocate: %s', $Index1, $Dummy2, $Dummy1, $New.Z, null
skip if $Dummy1 > 0 break end
* Brent note: force index1 to 0 for the smallest cube type. $Index1 = 0
$Module.Holder.Type = $Modular.Factories[$Index1] $Module.Holder.Name = $Index1 * 10 + 12201 $Module.Holder.Name = read text: page=17 id=$Module.Holder.Name do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='MH index: %s, Type: %s, Name: %s', $Index1, $Module.Holder.Type, $Module.Holder.Name, null, null
$Dummy2 = 0
if $Module.Holder -> exists $Guardian = $Module.Holder -> get local variable: name='GZ.GUARDIAN' if $Station.size.total < 1 do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Station size total: %s. Deleting existing module holder: %s', $Station.size.total, $Module.Holder, null, null, null $Module.Holder ->destruct: show no explosion=[TRUE] $Guardian ->destruct: show no explosion=[TRUE] endsub end
* existing type is correct $Dummy1 = $Module.Holder -> get ware type code of object if $Dummy1 == $Module.Holder.Type * if $Module.Holder-> is of type $Module.Holder.Type $Module.Holder ->start task 11 with script plugin.gz.CompClean.station and prio 0: arg1='modular.factory' arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Existing module holder %s is of required type %s. Exit Cleanup.', $Module.Holder, $Module.Holder.Type, null, null, null endsub end do if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Existing MH %s is NOT of required type %s. Saving values and deleting MH.', $Module.Holder, $Module.Holder.Type, null, null, null
$Save.Shield = $Module.Holder -> get current shield strength $Save.LT = $Module.Holder -> get amount of ware Lasertower in cargo bay $Save.SQM = $Module.Holder -> get amount of ware SQUASH Mine in cargo bay $Guardian = $Module.Holder -> get local variable: name='GZ.GUARDIAN' $Module.Holder ->destruct: show no explosion=[TRUE] end
do if $Station.size.total < 1 endsub
* No module holder exists. $Module.Holder = create station: type=$Module.Holder.Type owner=Neutral Race addto=$Sector x=$New.X y=$New.Y z=$New.Z $Module.Holder ->set name to $Module.Holder.Name $Module.Holder ->station trade and production tasks: on=[FALSE] $Module.Holder ->force position: x=$New.X y=$New.Y z=$New.Z $Module.Holder ->set local variable: name='GZ.FACTORY.MODULE.HOLDER' value=[TRUE] $Module.Holder ->set local variable: name='GZ.GUARDIAN' value=$Guardian $Module.Holder ->set local variable: name='STO.marked' value=[TRUE] $Module.Holder ->start task 11 with script plugin.gz.CompClean.station and prio 0: arg1='modular.factory' arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null
$Module.Holder ->set local variable: name='GZ.TOW.PROTECT' value=[TRUE] $Dummy1 = $Index1 * 10 + 20 = $Module.Holder -> install $Dummy1 units of 2 GJ Shield * $Module.Holder-> add product to factory or dock: {Lasertower} * $Module.Holder-> add product to factory or dock: {SQUASH Mine} * = $Module.Holder-> add $Save.LT units of {Lasertower} * = $Module.Holder-> add $Save.SQM units of {SQUASH Mine} $Module.Holder ->set current shield strength to $Save.Shield
if $Debug write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='New module holder %s created at %s, %s, %s.', $Module.Holder, $New.X, $New.Y, $New.Z, null write to log file #$PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Shields installed: %s, current SStr: %s, Stored LT: %s, SQMines: %s', $Dummy1, $Save.Shield, $Save.LT, $Save.SQM, null end
* The new module holder can be bigger and trap existing ships. * Make sure no ships get trapped by the module holder $Dummy1 = [Find.Enemy] | [Find.Friend] | [Find.Neutral] | [Find.Multiple] $Station.Arr = find ship: sector=$Sector class or type=Ship race=null flags=$Dummy1 refobj=$Module.Holder maxdist=12000 maxnum=999 refpos=null $Index1 = size of array $Station.Arr while $Index1 > 0 dec $Index1 = $Station = $Station.Arr[$Index1] $New.X = $Station -> get x position $New.Y = $Station -> get y position $New.Z = $Station -> get z position $Station ->set position: x=$New.X y=$New.Y z=$New.Z end
endsub
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Store.Cash: do if $Cash.Add < 1 endsub $Cash.Store = $Cash.Store + $Cash.Add do if $Cash.Store < 1 OR $Cash.Store > 2000000000 $Cash.Store = 2000000000 endsub
return null

comment.var: $Debug = [TRUE]
goto label Cleanup:
Filter stations. Complexed stations can not be used.

line.text: get player owned station array from sector

comment.var: only REAL factories return 1+

line.text: get number of products per cycle
get max. store amount of ware
get ware type code of object

comment.var: Check for multiple (or no) product factories,
which do not really work in complexes

line.text: get tradable ware array from station

comment.var: XTC stations must have run their setup for player build stations first.
Station too big to crunch: Only max size MODULES are ignored
Super sized mines are not a problem.

line.text: get ware type code of object

comment.var: = max size factory module I have
gosub Find.station.size:

line.var: 'This is a MAX size factory module.'

comment.var: Sort stations by type - all sizes
Sort by KIND of resources, regardless of size
stations.sorted = full storage array, stations.match= only first entry for match
New station type found
Add to existing entry

line.var: ' Adding %s to existing subarray at index %s'

comment.var: Combine Factories into bigger ones

line.var: 'Crunch: Got sorted array of %s, match array of %s. %s, %s'

comment.var: Find combined production factor of all similiar fabs

line.text: get tradable ware array from station

comment.var: Assemble stock levels while I'm looping the subarray anyway
end Index 2

line.var: 'Stations of type %s have a combined prod factor of %s'

comment.var: Find minimum number of factories

line.var: ' + + + + Current Nr of %s stations: %s, Projected Nr: %s'

comment.var: I CAN reduce the Nr of factories:
